column3: Added corrections for three misspellings of the word "transaction" :-)

I would keep this as-is, since "seek" has a technical meaning (referring to the system call of the same name). It's not necessarily grammatical English, but I'd consider it grammatical programmer-English.
Sure, but is the documentation referring to the system call in this specific case?
how about "...so that we don't need to seek through the blockchain again"?
